mapper.select: SELECT SUM(score) score,stuid from subscore where exam_grade_sub_id IN (SELECT id from examgradesub where examid=#{examId}) GROUP BY stuid

SELECT ss.stuid,ee.name,ee.stuno,egs.id egsId,su.id subId,su.name subName,ifnull(ss.score,0) score,ifnull(ss.sub_score,0) subScore,ifnull(ss.obj_score,0) objScore from examgradesub egs LEFT JOIN (SELECT * from subscore where stuid=#{stuId}) ss ON egs.id=ss.exam_grade_sub_id LEFT JOIN examinee ee ON ss.stuid=ee.id LEFT JOIN subject su ON egs.sub_id=su.id where egs.examid=#{examId}
